title.rendered: Mandatory notification of trade in Aqualis ASA

content.rendered: On 29 July 2015, Aman Marine Ltd, a company controlled by Reuben Segal, Director Middle East at Aqualis, acquired 60,000 shares at an average purchase price of NOK 8.6701 per share. After this transaction Reuben Segal, and related parties, hold 963,869 shares in Aqualis ASA.
